message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. This is a high-quality item worth more than $100 to us, and we believe this price offers a great value for you considering its worth of $80 to you. We're looking forward to your response.

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, but $95 is a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $85, which is still a fair price considering my budget and the value I place on the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I'm glad to present a counteroffer of $90 for our premium product. This price reflects the value we place on it while still being within your budget considerations. I hope this proposal works for you.
